      • getRatesByDate

        @RequestMapping(value="/date")
public java.lang.String getRatesByDate(@RequestParam(value="text")
                                                                       java.lang.String param_date)
        REST controller can take Date as input and gives exchange rate and currencies as output. Sample - http://ec2-**-**-98-69.compute-1.amazonaws.com:8080/converter/date?text=2017-01-01 Returns all the Exchange rates on the specified Date Supports only 8 currencies Try invalid Dates Try -Invalid Dates Error will be returned .
